actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To provide for supplemental appropriations to increase the number of Americorps members and to increase the living allowances of such members, and for other purposes.
short_title: Promoting National Service and Reducing Unemployment Act

summary.text:
Promoting National Service and Reducing Unemployment Act 

This bill provides supplemental appropriations to (1) increase the number of national service positions approved under the AmeriCorps program, and (2) increase the living allowance for participants in the program.
